name: Pulp & Logic
description:
Ready for the new logic game that will refresh your brain?

Then get ready for Pulp & Logic. As a mix between crossword puzzles and Sudoku, you will have to find the right combination of fruits to make a nice and juicy cocktail. How far can you go with the three lives you have? Get ready to stirr up a refreshing cocktail of fruit cubes for your brain.

The puzzles are getting harder and harder... Can you keep up and make it to level 50? 100? Or even more?

Your daily dose of fresh fruity brain teasers... on your iPhone and iPad.
